name: Breaking Box
description:
Gameplay:
Breaking Box is a 3D sandbox puzzle game with physics-based puzzles and 60 elements with unique characteristics. Coupled with your own imagination, the game offers a wide variety of gameplay dynamics.

In Breaking Box, you control a box with a superpower allowing it to grow and then break into multiple smaller parts of itself. Working together with various items, it will allow you to explore every inch of this world and unearth the secrets beneath.

Each NPC in the game has been given a special and often hilarious AI to bring more joy along the journey. On top of that, there are also boss fights for extra fun.

As Napoleon once said, “Every action adventure game carries a sandbox puzzle feature in his knapsack.” Now hop into this knapsack and unlock more fun!

Game Test Recruiting:
Our game mechanics and level designs are original and bold. So, we want you to join us as early as possible to test it out.
Join our test group, where we will send you the latest updates about the game, listen to your feedback and make Breaking Box the best we can.

Game Development Progress:
Breaking Box is currently in the stage of mechanics development and level designing. Nine levels are already rolled out with around four hours of gameplay. In the meanwhile, we are making more content.
We have designed 60 unique gameplay elements you can interact with. When putting these many variables together with the core box-breaking mechanics, we believe there will be an enormous amount of distinctive levels coming out of it. We are planning to put out 28 levels before fall 2019.
At the same time, we are also making the online and local multiplayer modes. New levels will be designed specifically for these multiplayer modes.
Finally, how is a level-design focused game complete without a custom level editor? We answer this question by crafting a level editor for you with which you can create a level with your own mark.
